comments.author: Dave
comments.body: There _was_ blood. Kudos to Melissa for playing my part today and taking the requisite Frenzy Flop. Hope it didn't hurt _too_ bad! Great ride, all! DU

comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: I think Melissa also had the quote of the day...something to the effect of "I was just thinking I wouldn't drive my car up this dirt road..." Never put it past SB to suggest a "rambo" ride.
